text: 2|174|Niscaya yara gopana kare allahâ€Œ kitaba hate ya nayila karechena ta ebam era binimaye tuccha mulya grahana kare, tara tadera nijedera pete aguna chara [1] ara kichu'i khaya na. Ara keyamatera dina allahâ€Œ tadera sathe katha balabena na ebam taderake pabitra'o karabena na. Ara tadera jan'ya rayeche yantranadayaka sasti.
